meanings.definition: A sound made by something wet hitting a surface.
meanings.sent1: The splat of the rain on the roof was soothing.
meanings.sent2: I heard a loud splat when the tomato hit the ground.
meanings.sent3: The splat of the mud on my shoes made me giggle.
meanings.sent4: Her painting had a big red splat in the corner.
meanings.sent5: The splat of the pancake hitting the pan was loud and clear.

meanings.definition: To make a wet hitting sound.
meanings.sent1: He likes to splat the paint on the canvas for effect.
meanings.sent2: The water balloon will splat against the wall if thrown hard.
meanings.sent3: The chef will splat the dough to make it flat for baking.
meanings.sent4: The bug will splat against the windshield if we don't drive carefully.
meanings.sent5: She will splat the wet sponge on the table to clean up the mess.

meanings.definition: A shape or mark made by something wet hitting a surface.
meanings.sent1: The chocolate cake had a splat of frosting on top.
meanings.sent2: The bird left a splat on the car windshield.
meanings.sent3: The splat of ketchup on his shirt was hard to miss.
meanings.sent4: The artist added a bright red splat to the painting for contrast.
meanings.sent5: The mud left a splat on the clean floor after the kids played outside.
